titles.title: A resolution to express the sense of the Senate that States should have in place backup systems to deal with any failure of electronic voting equipment during the November 7, 2006, general election.
A resolution to express the sense of the Senate that States should have in place backup systems to deal with any failure of electronic voting equipment during the November 7, 2006, general election.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.

bill.summary: Expresses the sense of the Senate that states and jurisdictions that use electronic voting equipment should have in place for use in the November 7, 2006, general election a backup system, such as the use of paper ballots, in the case of any equipment failure.
